fields.name: badPasswordTime
fields.title: Bad Password Time
fields.description: The last time and date that an attempt to log on to this account was made with a password that is not valid.

fields.name: badPasswordCount
fields.title: Bad Password Count
fields.description: The number of times the user tried to log on to the account using an incorrect password.

fields.name: lockoutTime
fields.title: Lockout Time
fields.description: The date and time that this account was locked out.

fields.name: logonCount
fields.title: Logon Count
fields.description: The number of times the account has successfully logged on.

fields.name: enabled
fields.title: Enabled
fields.description: Indicates whether a user is enabled or not.

fields.name: lastLogon
fields.title: Last Logon
fields.description: The last time and date the user logged on.

fields.name: groups
fields.title: User Groups
fields.description: A collection of groups where user belongs.

constraints.description: User name must be unique across different records.
